markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Clown Monarch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1997)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 68 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 21 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A victim of clown monarch is amusing to behold as they repeatedly suffer slapstick pratfalls. This poison disrupts the victim's sense of balance.

 **Saving Throw** DC 22 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) and must succeed at a DC 5 flat check when attempting a Stand action or the action fails and is lost (1 round); **Stage 2** as stage 1 but the DC is 10 (1 round); **Stage 3** as stage 1 but the DC is 15 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
